name: Cakephp-litle-plugin
body:
### Litle & Co, API CakePHP Plugin.
This API should help make it easy to implement Litle API interactions.  Currently we support SALE and VOID and CREDIT transactions, but extending beyond should be pretty simple.  The API is implemented on the Model level, using a datasource to process the requests.

```
cd your_path/app/plugins
git clone git://github.com/zeroasterisk/CakePHP-Litle-Plugin.git litle
cp litle/config/litle.example.php ../config/litle.php
```

or

```
cd your_path
git submodule add git://github.com/zeroasterisk/CakePHP-Litle-Plugin.git app/plugins/litle
cp app/plugins/litle/config/litle.example.php app/config/litle.php
```
   
Finally, add the following to app/config/database.php

    public $litle = array(
        'datasource' => 'Litle.LitleSource',
        /* the rest of the conifugration is in config/litle.php */
        );

## Configuration

Edit: app/config/litle.php

It's a good idea to log every API interaction, both what we sent and what we get back.

    $config['Litle']['logModel'] = 'MyCustomLoggingModel';
    $MyCustomLoggingModel->logLitleRequest($LitleSale->lastRequest); # else
    //$MyCustomLoggingModel->logRequest($LitleSale->lastRequest); # else
    //$MyCustomLoggingModel->save($LitleSale->lastRequest);
    
    # FYI: $lastRequest = compact('type', 'status', 'response', 'message', 'transaction_id', 'litleToken', 'errors', 'data', 'request_raw', 'response_array', 'response_raw', 'url');

## Features

* Credit Card Processing
 * sales (charges)
 * voids
 * credits (refunds)
* Tokenization
 * built into the sale
 * stand alone API
* Recycler Advice / Updater
 * built into the sale / implied on recycle attempts
